parameters.name: CloseAllGaps
parameters.description: True to repair any gaps, false to not

parameters.name: RemoveFaces
parameters.description: True to remove any bad faces and create gaps in the feature, false to not

parameters.name: FixFaces
parameters.description: True to fix the bad faces, false to not

title: IPartDoc.ImportDiagnosis
description: Diagnoses and repairs any gaps or bad faces on imported features.
signature:
System.Int32 ImportDiagnosis( 
   System.Boolean
CloseAllGaps
,
   System.Boolean
RemoveFaces
,
   System.Boolean
FixFaces
,
   System.Int32
Options
)

parameters.name: CloseAllGaps
parameters.description: True to repair any gaps, false to not

parameters.name: RemoveFaces
parameters.description: True to remove any bad faces and create gaps in the feature, false to not

parameters.name: FixFaces
parameters.description: True to fix the bad faces, false to not

returns: >= 0 if import diagnosis is successful, -1 if an error occurred
remarks: Use this method for an imported solid body that has rebuild errors or for an imported surface that did not knit into a solid body.
